title: Staten Island
summary: Staten Island  (/ˌstætən/)  is a borough of New York City, coextensive with Richmond County, in the U.S. state of New York. Located in the southwest portion of the city, the borough is separated from New Jersey by the Arthur Kill and the Kill Van Kull and from the rest of New York by New York Bay. With a population of 495,747 in the 2020 Census,[4] Staten Island is the least-populated of the boroughs but is the third-largest in land area at 58.5 sq mi (152 km2).
